content.value: Granify is a SaaS solution that fits smack dab at the intersection of artificial intelligence and e-commerce. It enables online retailers to maximize their sales by using cutting edge big data and machine learning technologies. The software predicts specific user barriers, and offers solutions to those problems before the user leaves the site.
